backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles with access control plus predefined Bible stories and admin‑restricted image upload.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking an empty‑state UI update on the Stories page to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of all major frontend files describing styling, routing, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide documenting exact steps to publish the draft build to production on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon links, and loading the main React script.
frontend/PRODUCTION-RELEASE-CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive checklist for validating, deploying, and verifying a production release.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, stories, verses, testaments, and the shared layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query‑cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a display name and saving it via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header navigation, footer, and profile setup dialog, wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/components/story/ImageUploa: Provides UI for admins to upload or replace images for stories or verses with validation and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/story/PublicImag: Renders an image from an ExternalBlob with error handling fallback UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, stories, verses, and images via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and theme variables for light/dark modes and typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/DailyVersePage.tsx: Displays the daily verse with loading, error, and refresh handling using styled card components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with navigation cards linking to daily verses, stories, and testaments.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of Bible stories with loading and error states, allowing navigation to individual story details.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a selected story, including its summary, image upload section, and associated verses.
frontend/src/pages/TestamentPage.tsx: Loads and lists verses for either the Old or New Testament, with navigation to verse detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/VerseDetailPage.tsx: Displays a specific verse with its text, optional image, and navigation back to its testament list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing site features, architecture notes, known issues, and versioned feature definitions for a Bible verses website.
